text: Ricardo Jorge de Sousa Pedrosa (born 2 January 1989) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Gondomar. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Boavista on 19 April 2009 in a game against União de Leiria. ==References== ==External links== Category:1989 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Boavista F.C. players Category:LigaPro players Category:C.D. Tondela players Category:Gondomar S.C. players Category:Association football defenders
title: Ricardo Pedrosa
